description: Pegs have always been popular on BoyNapped and this scene with newbie London teen Liam Strider and Adam Watson will blow your mind. Hung from the rafters, Liam is powerless to the abuse Adam has in mind. Adam loved dishing out pain and having his boys service him. In this scene Liam takes peg pain to such an extent he almost passes out. This little twink is relieved when Adam cuts him down and demands a blow-job which ends in Liam licking up Adam's dominant load.
title: Adam Watson & Liam Strider
